name: TURBO SPACE
description:
Travel to the Rhythm of the Music on 3 different levels. Get to your destination on a journey of light years,    but above all, don't miss a beat...

This  is a Rhythm Game project and it was created for  "Tu Juego a Juicio Jam".   Inspired in games like Just Shapes and Beats, Geometry Dash,   Groove Coaster, osu!catch and  Spin Rhythm XD

Made in 2 weeks.  It's played with mouse and keyboard.

Enjoy!
